verses.verse: שַׁאֲל֨וּ <WH7592> Ask מֵיְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> ye of the LORD מָטָר֙ <WH4306> rain בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in the time מַלְק֔וֹשׁ <WH4456> of the latter rain יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [so] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shall make חֲזִיזִ֑ים <WH2385> bright clouds וּמְטַר־ <WH4306> of rain גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> them showers יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and give לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like לְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> to every one עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> grass בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> in the field

כִּ֧י <WH3588> because הַתְּרָפִ֣ים <WH8655> For the idols דִּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> have spoken אָ֗וֶן <WH205> vanity וְהַקּֽוֹסְמִים֙ <WH7080> and the diviners חָ֣זוּ <WH2372> have seen שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lie וַֽחֲלֹמוֹת֙ <WH2472> dreams הַשָּׁ֣וא <WH7723> false. יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> and have told הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> in vain יְנַֽחֵמ֑וּן <WH5162> they comfort עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that נָסְע֣וּ <WH5265> therefore they went כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like צֹ֔אן <WH6629> their way as a flock יַעֲנ֖וּ <WH6031> they were troubled כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אֵ֥ין <WH369> there רֹעֶֽה׃ <WH7462> because [there was] no shepherd פ

עַל־ <WH5921> against הָֽרֹעִים֙ <WH7462> against the shepherds חָרָ֣ה <WH2734> was kindled אַפִּ֔י <WH639> Mine anger וְעַל־ <WH5921> against הָעַתּוּדִ֖ים <WH6260> the goats אֶפְק֑וֹד <WH6485> and I punished כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָקַד֩ <WH6485> hath visited יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> for the LORD צְבָא֤וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֶת־ <WH853> עֶדְרוֹ֙ <WH5739> his flock אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְשָׂ֣ם <WH7760> and hath made אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כְּס֥וּס <WH5483> horse הוֹד֖וֹ <WH1935> them as his goodly בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in the battle

מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <WH4480> at פִנָּה֙ <WH6438> the corner מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> them יָתֵ֔ד <WH3489> out of him the nail מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> them קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> bow מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> out of him the battle מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> them יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> Out of him came forth כָל־ <WH3605> every נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <WH5065> out of him every oppressor יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> will be as כְגִבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> And they shall be as mighty בּוֹסִ֨ים <WH947> [men] which tread down בְּטִ֤יט <WH2916> [their enemies] in the mire חוּצוֹת֙ <WH2351> of the streets בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> in the battle וְנִ֨לְחֲמ֔וּ <WH3898> and they shall fight כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> with וְהֹבִ֖ישׁוּ <WH3001> shall be confounded רֹכְבֵ֥י <WH7392> [is] with them and the riders סוּסִֽים׃ <WH5483> on horses

וְגִבַּרְתִּ֣י ׀ <WH1396> And I will strengthen אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> of Joseph אוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <WH3467> and I will save וְהֽוֹשְׁבוֹתִים֙ <WH7725> will bring כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because רִֽחַמְתִּ֔ים <WH7355> them for I have mercy וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> shall be as כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> upon them and they shall be as though לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not זְנַחְתִּ֑ים <WH2186> I had not cast them off כִּ֗י <WH3588> Because אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God וְאֶעֱנֵֽם׃ <WH6030> and will hear

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> will be like כְגִבּוֹר֙ <WH1368> shall be like a mighty אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> And [they of] Ephraim וְשָׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> [man] and their heart כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> if יָ֑יִן <WH3196> as through wine וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> yea their children יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see וְשָׂמֵ֔חוּ <WH8056> glad יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> their heart בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD

אֶשְׁרְקָ֥ה <WH8319> I will hiss לָהֶ֛ם וַאֲקַבְּצֵ֖ם <WH6908> for them and gather כִּ֣י <WH3588> for פְדִיתִ֑ים <WH6299> them for I have redeemed וְרָב֖וּ <WH7235> them and they shall increase כְּמ֥וֹ <WH3644> will be as רָבֽוּ׃ <WH7235> as they have increased

וְאֶזְרָעֵם֙ <WH2232> And I will sow בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> them among the people וּבַמֶּרְחַקִּ֖ים <WH4801> me in far countries יִזְכְּר֑וּנִי <WH2142> and they shall remember וְחָי֥וּ <WH2421> and they shall live אֶת־ <WH854> with בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> with their children וָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH7725> and turn again

וַהֲשִֽׁיבוֹתִים֙ <WH7725> I will bring them again מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> also out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּמֵֽאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> them out of Assyria אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <WH6908> and gather וְאֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> them into the land גִּלְעָ֤ד <WH1568> of Gilead וּלְבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> and Lebanon אֲבִיאֵ֔ם <WH935> and I will bring וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> and [place] shall not be found לָהֶֽם׃

וְעָבַ֨ר <WH5674> And he shall pass through בַּיָּ֜ם <WH3220> the sea צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> with affliction וְהִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> and shall smite בַיָּם֙ <WH3220> in the sea גַּלִּ֔ים <WH1530> the waves וְהֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <WH3001> shall dry up כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מְצוּל֣וֹת <WH4688> and all the deeps יְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> of the river וְהוּרַד֙ <WH3381> shall be brought down גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> and the pride אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְשֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> and the sceptre מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt יָסֽוּר׃ <WH5493> shall depart away

וְגִבַּרְתִּים֙ <WH1396> And I will strengthen בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> them in the LORD וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> in his name יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <WH1980> and they shall walk up and down נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
